Class AllyPokemon

java.lang.Object
AllyPokemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pokemon<EnemyPokemon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FireType, GrassType, WaterType
public abstract class AllyPokemon extends Object implements Pokemon<EnemyPokemon>
Class used to manage all of the ally pokemons
